item.title: The Seesaw First Five Days
item.description: The Seesaw First Five Daysfrancinegoldsteinmarketblog: January 8, 2015 Happy new year! Volatility is alive and well! Letâ€™s recap the first five days: the S&P 500 Index sold off 2.7% for the first three days and then surged 3.0% for the next two days. The sharp stock market volatility has proved especially challenging for all but the nimblest… Thanks for the advice, seems like a fairly low risk / low maintenance way to maintain a portfolio.
